document.full_text: blues musician joe willie "pinetop" perkins, who this year became the oldest person ever to win a grammy award, died at his austin home on monday at age 97.
document.title: blues musician "pinetop" perkins dies at 97
lines_and_colors: blues musician joe willie "pinetop" perkins, who this year became the oldest person ever to win a grammy award, died at his austin home on monday at age 97.
